bioAsHtml:
I am a full-stack Scala / JS developer living in Lille, France. I first started using Scala a couple of years ago and it has become my favorite tool since then. I enjoy learning as well as sharing my knowledge with the world. Also, I like listening to Jodel Music, it helps me focus.

I currently work for Linkvalue, a French people-first tech company, built on skill, technique and innovation that provides high-level consulting services, support and development.
